#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/get-conversation-counts#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/get-conversation-counts#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

#### Query Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/get-conversation-counts#parameter-status)

status

enum<string>

default:open

Filter by conversation status.

Available options:

`all`,

`open`,

`resolved`,

`pending`,

`snoozed`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations/get-conversation-counts#parameter-q)

q

string

Filters conversations with messages containing the search term
